expandoFunctionAsAssertion(4,62): error TS1128: Declaration or statement expected.
expandoFunctionAsAssertion(4,62): error TS1005: ';' expected.

==== expandoFunctionAsAssertion (5 errors) ====
    
    function example() {}
    
    example.isFoo = function isFoo(value: string): asserts value is 'foo' {
                    ~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS1005: ';' expected.
                    ~~~~~~~~

                                                           ~~~~~
!!! error TS1005: '{' expected.

!!! error TS1128: Declaration or statement expected.

!!! error TS1005: ';' expected.
      if (value !== 'foo') {
        throw new Error('Not foo');
      }
    };
    
    example.isFoo('test');
